// Soothing Color Palette for Mental Wellness
export const colors={// Primary soothing colors
softBlue:'#6B9BD1',forestGreen:'#7FB069',mutedPurple:'#9B8FB8',charcoal:'#2C3E50',// Backgrounds
backgroundLight:'#F8FAFC',backgroundSoft:'#F0F4F8',backgroundCard:'#FFFFFF',// Text
textPrimary:'#1A202C',textSecondary:'#4A5568',textTertiary:'#718096',// Accents
accentBlue:'#5A8FC7',accentGreen:'#6FA055',accentPurple:'#8A7BA5',accentOrange:'#E8A87C',// States
success:'#48BB78',warning:'#ED8936',error:'#F56565',// Gradients
gradientCalm:'linear-gradient(135deg, #6B9BD1 0%, #9B8FB8 100%)',gradientEnergy:'linear-gradient(135deg, #E8A87C 0%, #F4A460 100%)',gradientGround:'linear-gradient(135deg, #7FB069 0%, #6B9BD1 100%)',// Shadows
shadowSoft:'0 2px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.04)',shadowMedium:'0 4px 16px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.08)',shadowLarge:'0 8px 32px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.12)'};// Typography
export const typography={fontFamily:'-apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "SF Pro Display", "Inter", "Satoshi", "Segoe UI", sans-serif',fontSizes:{xs:'0.75rem',// 12px
sm:'0.875rem',// 14px
base:'1rem',// 16px
lg:'1.125rem',// 18px
xl:'1.25rem',// 20px
'2xl':'1.5rem',// 24px
'3xl':'1.875rem',// 30px
'4xl':'2.25rem',// 36px
'5xl':'3rem'// 48px
},fontWeights:{light:300,regular:400,medium:500,semibold:600,bold:700},lineHeights:{tight:1.2,normal:1.5,relaxed:1.75}};// Spacing
export const spacing={xs:'0.5rem',// 8px
sm:'0.75rem',// 12px
md:'1rem',// 16px
lg:'1.5rem',// 24px
xl:'2rem',// 32px
'2xl':'3rem',// 48px
'3xl':'4rem'// 64px
};// Border radius
export const borderRadius={sm:'0.5rem',// 8px
md:'1rem',// 16px
lg:'1.5rem',// 24px
xl:'2rem',// 32px
full:'9999px'};// Transitions
export const transitions={fast:'0.15s ease',normal:'0.3s ease',slow:'0.5s ease',breathing:'0.8s ease-in-out'};
